forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after 3am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northeast wind 6 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn colors the sky over Downtown San Francisco, the city begins its day shrouded in a lingering fog that will soon dissolve under the soft caress of the sun. With temperatures lingering in the cool mid-fifties, the warmth of the morning sun will provide a welcomed contrast as it climbs higher. An invigorating north-northeast breeze stirs the crisp air, promising a pleasant afternoon punctuated by clear blue skies, though the early hours might still have a hint of that coastal mist, particularly close to the bay, where the Golden Gate Bridge whispers hidden secrets beneath a veil of fog.

As the day unfolds, anticipation builds for a refreshing outdoor experience. A light jacket or sweater is advisable for the morning, especially if venturing toward the waterfront, which often holds onto the marine layer longer than other parts of the city. As the fog recedes, it reveals the vibrant life of the streets, inviting you to explore. Consider a stroll along the Embarcadero, relishing a warm cup of coffee while watching the world awaken, or perhaps discover one of the many cozy cafes tucked away in the Mission District, where the buzz of conversation mingles with the aroma of freshly baked pastries. Whether you choose to admire the urban landscape or dive into a small discovery of San Francisco’s culinary jewels, today holds the promise of clear skies and a gentle chill that keeps the city unique.
